content: half_double_crochet in next chain space 2dc ch2 2 double_crochet in next chain space corner 2 half_double_crochet in next chain space 2 single_crochet in next chain space half_double_crochet in next chain space fphdc around next popcorn half_double_crochet in next chain space* repeat from * to * around omitting the last half_double_crochet close with a slip_stitch in first half_double_crochet and cut yarn 4 double_crochet 6 half_double_crochet 4 single_crochet 1 fphdc per side 1 corner ch2 space round 7 with new color stand double_crochet in any corner chain space double_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet in same chain space *double_crochet in each st across to next corner 2 double_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet in next corner chain space* repeat from * to * around omitting the last corner stitches close with a slip_stitch in first double_crochet cut yarn and weave in all ends 19 double_crochet per side 1 corner ch2 space _____________________________________________ design by © koernerklaus 2019 no sale no uploading on social media no publishing of excerpts from the pattern copyright is up to me
